amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.catchline: (UTC 601) Capacity of settlor of revocable trust.
amendatorysection.para: (UTC 601) The capacity required to create, amend, revoke, or add property to a revocable trust, or to direct the actions of the trustee of a revocable trust, is the same as that required to make a will.
